main event: Observers reported seeing three bright reddish-orange triangular objects in the sky near Monroe, Oregon on December 22, 1966.
interesting points: The objects made sharp turns and appeared to change directions frequently., The observers included a family with children, all of whom saw the sighting., The objects left a vapor trail in the sky after disappearing., The sighting lasted for about 20 minutes but the objects were observed for a total of 1.5 hours earlier in the day., The objects emitted no sound while hovering and climbed rapidly to a height of about 1/4 mile.
witness description: A family including a husband, wife, and their three children.
